author: Daniel Kaszor
title: Oscars 2017 winners and losers live as they happen | National Post
text: FarkIt The question isn’t if the 89th Academy Awards be full of political speeches and a landslide for “La La Land,” but how those things will happen. Sunday night’s Oscars are shaping up to be one of the most turbulent and politically charged ceremonies in recent memory. The three-hour-plus telecast, which begins at 8:30 p.m. Eastern Time on CTV , is expected to resemble one very glitzy protest against U.S. President Donald Trump, whom award-winners — such as Meryl Streep at the Golden Globes — have railed against throughout Hollywood’s awards season. Join us live as we navigate through the night with the level of snark and back-seat picking that the show deserves!
